mean_en: to change (a written work) by removing parts that might offend people
sentence: The organization expurgated some of the document\u0027s sensitive content before releasing it to the public.
sentence_trans: 这个组织在公布文件之前删去了一些敏感内容。
word_etyma: ex出，出去 ＋ purg冲洗 ＋ ate使之成... → 冲洗出来 → expurgate净化；删去
